Reviews.Title: great item
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: I never owned a digital camers before, this is my first one and i am very please with how my pictures turned out also the video is great.great product for it price

Reviews.Title: Gift for grandma
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and I thought would be the perfect fit for my grandparents who are entering the digital world with fear--they are in their 80's.  The camera takes fuzzy pictures.  I have a hard time getting a good image and I spend much of my free time with a camera.  not a good option.  Pay more to stress less

Reviews.Title: HATE IT
Reviews.Author: Justine Chase
Reviews.Content: This camera is HORRIBLE and I plan to return for a full purchase.  The flash doesn't work and the focus is awful.

Reviews.Title: cobra digital dca 1220 - red
Reviews.Author: catherine ramnath
Reviews.Content: I chose this product for my son because of the ok reviews.  The product did not live up to my expectations. It's just a cheap camera.  Guess I got what I paid for.

ProductInfo.Features:
12 megapixel
8x digital zoom
2.4" color LTPS LCD screen
Video record function
TV output
ProductInfo.Name: COBRA DIGITAL DCA1220-RED 12.0 Megapixel DCA1220 Digital Camera (Red)
